introduction: "Gray's Disconnect" is about these four foster siblings that differ in all things except their wounds. Raised in an abusive home as children, as adults they strive to find an equilibrium of peace. However, when you're confronted by your past or those that know you from it, can you stand your ground speaking your truth or will you crumble under the weight of the memories? Each sisters searches for peace and truth in their own ways. It finds them but not in the way they expect.
